DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether continuous infusion of palonosetron after its prophylactic single injection can further reduce the incidence of postoperative nausea and vomiting in patients undergoing gynecological laparoscopic surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Continuous Infusion of Palonosetron for Preventing of Postoperative Nausea and Vomiting
